title: Blink (status)
data: {{version030}} {{flavour|You are unstable and cannot cast Blink or activate evoked blink abilities for a short period of time. Powerful sources of translocation magic such as scrolls of blinking ignore this limitation, as do external sources of blinking outside of your control.}} '''-Blink''' is a [[status effect]] you suffer after casting [[Blink]] or evoking a +Blink ability. It prevents you from casting the spell or evoking the ability for (50 - )/10 + 1d2 - 1 turns{{source ref|0.28.0|spl-transloc.cc|722}}. {{crawlquote|You are still too unstable to blink.}} At zero power the cooldown is 5-6 turns; at the full power the cooldown is reduced to zero. The status does not prevent the use of [[scrolls of blinking]], [[Passage of Golubria]], or any external source of Translocations magic. ==History== *This status effect was added in [[0.28]]. ==References== [[Category:Status effects]]
